alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:50PM CDT until July 17 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Peru, or 6 miles east of Sedan, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Caney, Sedan, Tyro, Peru, Chautauqua, Havana, Niotaze and Hale. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
